title: yoosli
content:
hi guys, love this! does someone know the font used for the "yoosli" logo and the handwritten condensend one shown in the other image? thanks for you help!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018043625im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Yoosli-potw%20(8)_5708.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018043625im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Yoosli-potw%20(3)_3614.jpg)
author: flabrea

comments.content:
Don't know the one for "yoosli". /s reminds me of [Omnes](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018043625/http:/www.dardenstudio.com/typefaces/omnes_pro) though (may be a custom version of it?).  
The handwritten condensed one should be [Liebe Erika](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018043625/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/liebe-fonts/liebe-erika).

Alternatives for "yoosli": [Foco](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018043625/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/daltonmaag/foco) (probably the closest I've found, starting "hoosi" black italic and backslanting it), [Merge](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018043625/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/philatype/merge-pro), [Masala](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018043625/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/masala), [Club Type](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018043625/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/clubtype/club-type), [Gusto](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018043625/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typesketchbook/gusto), [Brevia](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018043625/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hvdfonts/brevia), [Fiancé](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018043625/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/fiance), [Comalle](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018043625/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/latinotype/comalle), [Tomate](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018043625/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/re-type/tomate)
